XScaler_Config Struct Reference

#include <xscaler.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

This typedef contains configuration information for a Scaler device. Each Scaler device should have a configuration structure associated

Separate Horizontal/Vertical Coefficient banks. Common only possible if num_h_taps = num_v_taps
